Name: Activate browser key
Requires: recoveryDelay period, or active browser key signature
Notes: While any browser key can be used to trade, only an active browser key can be used as a second factor for sensitive actions (like withdrawing)

Name: Add, remove, or change recovery key
Requires: Active browser key signature and (MFA key or recover key) signature

Name: Add, remove, or change MFA key
Requires: Active browser key signature and (MFA key or recover key) signature

Name: Add emergency withdrawal address
Requires: Active browser key signature and MFA key signature
